transcript.text: shabbat shalom it's now the end of the
day of June 4th 2017 Sunday still still
daylight but it is Sunday June the 4th
and it is a boat Pentecost and I just
wanted to post some pictures of our
Shadwick Pentecost celebration that we
had today this was at a grains that we
had out in the coastal mountains of
Oregon and a bunch of home fellowship
groups joined together the praise and
worship was just so so beautiful I mean
it was just you could just feel the gush
of the rock just sweeping through the
place we had live worship really good
teaching and just just a very very
anointed time of praise and worship and
and it was very joy to see so many home
different home fellowships doing joined
together for the feast so we did that
and then they created this like little
hoopla thing kind of like almost a
foretaste of Sukkot that will come in
the fall but it was about Shavuot of
course Chev wood is all about the giving
of the Torah on Mount Sinai and then the
giving of the ruach ha'qodesh on the day
of Pentecost of course you can't have
one without the other is so important
you cannot keep the Torah without the
indwelling of the Spirit and if you're
going to effectively be used by his
Spirit you've got to follow the Torah
they're both inextricably tied together
and then after that we headed out back
to Phil and Camilla's place also another
place in the coastal mountains and we
all sort of just many of us from the
fellowship gathered together and just
had some prayer time and shared
testimonies and just encouraged each
other in the faith it was a very very
beautiful time of fellowship and
you know shabwa pedagogy at least in
years past always seems to like there's
something crazy that happens during this
time of year but this was really a very
joyous and wonderful celebration but
again my whole website spirit and core
calm that whole name is basically based
on this particular feast I think the
piece of sh a bloat Pentecost is one of
the most important feasts at least for
what we're supposed to be doing right
now which is walking in the Torah and
walking in a spirit and one of my
prayers that's been on my heart and I
shared this when we prayed that later
this afternoon as well as just I really
want us I really want and I'm famous for
myself just like everyone else's
pressing into his word the fullness of
his Torah and the fullness of his spirit
you know having both in greater measures
in greater measures so that we can be
more effectively used by up and be
exalting the Messiah Yahshua I'm pretty
tired I'm worn out because we had a
pretty long day today but it was a
beautiful Shavuot beautiful feast of
Pentecost and I encourage you if you're
out there and you're just getting into
Torah these these days these are times
that yah has set aside these are
appointed times that he wants to meet
with us so I pray and hope that you will
if you haven't kept travel this year
that you will definitely do it next year
and all the other feast days as well
because they're very very important and
they continue to not only lead us closer
to yah by learning more about what these
feasts are but also just these are days
that are set aside that we're supposed
to join together with the Saints and get
into praise and worship and get into
prayer and lift each other up
we need these times y'all knew what he
was doing way back when when he set up
these appointed times so hallelujah
happy feast of Pentecost Shavuot 2017 if
you all have a blessed not only shabbat
shalom yesterday on june 3rd but also a
wonderful 50th count of the Omer Shavuot
Pentecost 2017 Daniel John Lee with poor
restoration ministries website is WWE
champ Ora
